fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you can cause the next phase to be day. (1 use)
- During the night, you can cause the next phase to be night. (1 use)
- (Necronomicon) During the day or night, you can perform a Basic attack. You can attack in consecutive phases.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - With the Necromicon, your first two abilities have unlimited uses, but you cannot use them twice in a row e.g. Day-Day-Day is not allowed, but Day-Day-Night-Night is allowed.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.
